DOC.brief_summary: Evaluating percentage patient suffer eye allergy determine whether also dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Patients With Eye Allergies Determining There Are Also Dry Eyes
DOC.criteria: Ability give inform consent Males females least 18 year age Personal history allergic disorder include limited allergic conjunctivitis , allergic rhinitis , contact dermatitis eczema , asthma Diagnosis allergic conjunctivitis Presence follow sign include conjunctival redness papilla , chemosis , red edematous eyelid , reduce tear clearance , reduce TBUT , vital staining , stringy discharge , and/or symptom include ocular itching , burn tearing , runny nose itchy throat Active ocular systemic infection History ocular infection within past 6 month Presence punctal plug Recent ocular surgery within past 6 month Current use chemotherapeutic agent Presence ocular trauma Inability give inform consent Women pregnant , nurse lactate
